text: Escape from the Planet of the Apes is a 1971 American science fiction adventure movie directed by Don Taylor and is the third movie in the original Planet of the Apes series. It stars Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter, Bradford Dillman, Natalie Trundy, Eric Braeden, William Windom, Sal Mineo and M. Emmet Walsh and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 science fiction movies Category:1971 adventure movies Category:Planet of the Apes movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Don Taylor Category:Movies about apes Category:Time travel movies Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:1970s English-language movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Movies composed by Jerry Goldsmith Category:Movies set in the future
title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
